-- | Bindings to the CUDD binary decision diagrams library
--   
--   Stand-alone package containing CUDD 2.5.0.
@package cudd
@version 0.1.0.0

module Cudd.Common
data SatBit
Zero :: SatBit
One :: SatBit
DontCare :: SatBit
toSatBit :: Int -> SatBit
expand :: SatBit -> [Bool]
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Cudd.Common.SatBit

module Cudd.MTR
data CMtrNode
newtype MtrNode s
MtrNode :: Ptr CMtrNode -> MtrNode s
c_mtrAllocNode :: IO (Ptr CMtrNode)
mtrAllocNode :: ST s (MtrNode s)
c_mtrCreateFirstChild :: Ptr CMtrNode -> IO (Ptr CMtrNode)
mtrCreateFirstChild :: MtrNode s -> ST s (MtrNode s)
c_mtrCreateLastChild :: Ptr CMtrNode -> IO (Ptr CMtrNode)
mtrCreateLastChild :: MtrNode s -> ST s (MtrNode s)
c_mtrDeallocNode :: Ptr CMtrNode -> IO ()
mtrDeallocNode :: MtrNode s -> ST s ()
c_mtrMakeFirstChild :: Ptr CMtrNode -> Ptr CMtrNode -> IO ()
mtrMakeFirstChild :: MtrNode s -> MtrNode s -> ST s ()
c_mtrMakeLastChild :: Ptr CMtrNode -> Ptr CMtrNode -> IO ()
mtrMakeLastChild :: MtrNode s -> MtrNode s -> ST s ()
c_mtrMakeNextSibling :: Ptr CMtrNode -> Ptr CMtrNode -> IO ()
mtrMakeNextSibling :: MtrNode s -> MtrNode s -> ST s ()
c_mtrPrintGroups :: Ptr CMtrNode -> CInt -> IO ()
mtrPrintGroups :: MtrNode s -> Int -> ST s ()
c_mtrPrintTree :: Ptr CMtrNode -> IO ()
mtrPrintTree :: MtrNode s -> ST s ()
c_mtrMakeGroup :: Ptr CMtrNode -> CInt -> CInt -> CInt -> IO (Ptr CMtrNode)
mtrMakeGroup :: MtrNode s -> Int -> Int -> Int -> ST s (MtrNode s)
c_mtrInitGroupTree :: CInt -> CInt -> IO (Ptr CMtrNode)
mtrInitGroupTree :: Int -> Int -> ST s (MtrNode s)
c_mtrFindGroup :: Ptr CMtrNode -> CUInt -> CUInt -> IO (Ptr CMtrNode)
mtrFindGroup :: MtrNode s -> Int -> Int -> ST s (MtrNode s)
c_mtrDissolveGroup :: Ptr CMtrNode -> IO ()
mtrDissolveGroup :: MtrNode s -> ST s ()
data MTRType
Mtrdefault :: MTRType
Mtrterminal :: MTRType
Mtrsoft :: MTRType
Mtrfixed :: MTRType

instance GHC.Classes.Eq Cudd.MTR.MTRType

instance GHC.Enum.Enum Cudd.MTR.MTRType

module Cudd.Internal
newtype DdManager
DdManager :: Ptr CDdManager -> DdManager
newtype STDdManager s u
STDdManager :: Ptr CDdManager -> STDdManager s u
[unSTDdManager] :: STDdManager s u -> Ptr CDdManager
newtype DdNode
DdNode :: ForeignPtr CDdNode -> DdNode
[unDdNode] :: DdNode -> ForeignPtr CDdNode
newtype DDNode s u
DDNode :: Ptr CDdNode -> DDNode s u
[unDDNode] :: DDNode s u -> Ptr CDdNode
deref :: FunPtr (Ptr CDdManager -> Ptr CDdNode -> IO ())
cudd_unique_slots :: Int
cudd_cache_slots :: Int
instance GHC.Show.Show Cudd.Internal.DdNode
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Cudd.Internal.DdNode
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Cudd.Internal.DdNode
instance GHC.Show.Show (Cudd.Internal.DDNode s u)
instance GHC.Classes.Eq (Cudd.Internal.DDNode s u)
instance GHC.Classes.Ord (Cudd.Internal.DDNode s u)

module Cudd.Imperative
cuddInit :: Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> ST s (STDdManager s u)
cuddInitDefaults :: ST s (STDdManager s u)
withManager :: Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> (forall u. STDdManager s u -> ST s a) -> ST s a
withManagerDefaults :: (forall u. STDdManager s u -> ST s a) -> ST s a
withManagerIO :: MonadIO m => Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> (forall u. STDdManager RealWorld u -> m a) -> m a
withManagerIODefaults :: MonadIO m => (forall u. STDdManager RealWorld u -> m a) -> m a
shuffleHeap :: STDdManager s u -> [Int] -> ST s ()
bzero :: STDdManager t t1 -> DDNode s u
bone :: STDdManager t t1 -> DDNode s u
ithVar :: Integral a => STDdManager t t1 -> a -> ST s1 (DDNode s u)
band :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
bor :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
bnand :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
bnor :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
bxor :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
bxnor :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
bnot :: DDNode t t1 -> DDNode s u
bite :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
bexists :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
bforall :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
deref :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s ()
setVarMap :: STDdManager s u -> [DDNode s u] -> [DDNode s u] -> ST s ()
varMap :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
data DDNode s u
data STDdManager s u
leq :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s Bool
swapVariables :: STDdManager s u -> [DDNode s u] -> [DDNode s u] -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
ref :: DDNode s u -> ST s ()
largestCube :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u, Int)
makePrime :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)

nodesToCube :: STDdManager s u -> [DDNode s u] -> ST s (DDNode s u)
readSize :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int

compose :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> Int -> ST s (DDNode s u)
andAbstract :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
xorExistAbstract :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)
leqUnless :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s Bool
equivDC :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s Bool
xeqy :: STDdManager s u -> [DDNode s u] -> [DDNode s u] -> ST s (DDNode s u)
debugCheck :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
checkKeys :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
pickOneMinterm :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> [DDNode s u] -> ST s (DDNode s u)
toInt :: DDNode s u -> Int
checkZeroRef :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int

readPerm :: STDdManager s u -> Int -> ST s Int
dagSize :: DDNode s u -> ST s Int

regular :: DDNode s u -> DDNode s u

readCacheUsedSlots :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cudd_unique_slots :: Int
cudd_cache_slots :: Int

readTree :: STDdManager s u -> ST s (MtrNode s)
newVarAtLevel :: STDdManager s u -> Int -> ST s (DDNode s u)

newVar :: STDdManager s u -> ST s (DDNode s u)

quit :: STDdManager s u -> ST s ()
readIndex :: DDNode s u -> ST s Int
printMinterm :: STDdManager s u -> DDNode s u -> ST s ()

module Cudd.Hook
cuddAddHook :: STDdManager s u -> HookFP -> CuddHookType -> ST s Int
cuddRemoveHook :: STDdManager s u -> HookFP -> CuddHookType -> ST s Int
type HookTyp = Ptr CDdManager -> CString -> Ptr () -> IO (CInt)
type HookFP = FunPtr HookTyp
data CuddHookType
CuddPreGcHook :: CuddHookType
CuddPostGcHook :: CuddHookType
CuddPreReorderingHook :: CuddHookType
CuddPostReorderingHook :: CuddHookType
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Cudd.Hook.CuddHookType
instance GHC.Show.Show Cudd.Hook.CuddHookType
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Cudd.Hook.CuddHookType

module Cudd.GC
cuddEnableGarbageCollection :: STDdManager s u -> ST s ()
cuddDisableGarbageCollection :: STDdManager s u -> ST s ()
cuddGarbageCollectionEnabled :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
c_preGCHook_sample :: HookFP
c_postGCHook_sample :: HookFP
regPreGCHook :: STDdManager s u -> HookFP -> ST s Int
regPostGCHook :: STDdManager s u -> HookFP -> ST s Int

module Cudd.Convert

toDdManager :: STDdManager s u -> DdManager

module Cudd.Reorder
data CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderSame :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderNone :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderRandom :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderRandomPivot :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderSift :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderSiftConverge :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderSymmSift :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderSymmSiftConv :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderWindow2 :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderWindow3 :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderWindow4 :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderWindow2Conv :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderWindow3Conv :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderWindow4Conv :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderGroupSift :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderGroupSiftConv :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderAnnealing :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderGenetic :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderLinear :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderLinearConverge :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderLazySift :: CuddReorderingType
CuddReorderExact :: CuddReorderingType

cuddAutodynDisable :: STDdManager s u -> ST s ()

cuddReadReorderingTime :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddReadReorderings :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddEnableReorderingReporting :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddDisableReorderingReporting :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddReorderingReporting :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
regStdPreReordHook :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
regStdPostReordHook :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddTurnOnCountDead :: STDdManager s u -> ST s ()
cuddTurnOffCountDead :: STDdManager s u -> ST s ()
cuddDeadAreCounted :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddReadSiftMaxSwap :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddSetSiftMaxSwap :: STDdManager s u -> Int -> ST s ()
cuddReadSiftMaxVar :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddSetSiftMaxVar :: STDdManager s u -> Int -> ST s ()
cuddReadNextReordering :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddSetNextReordering :: STDdManager s u -> Int -> ST s ()
cuddReadMaxGrowthAlternate :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Double
cuddSetMaxGrowthAlternate :: STDdManager s u -> Double -> ST s ()
cuddReadMaxGrowth :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Double
cuddSetMaxGrowth :: STDdManager s u -> Double -> ST s ()
cuddReadReorderingCycle :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddSetReorderingCycle :: STDdManager s u -> Int -> ST s ()
cuddSetPopulationSize :: STDdManager s u -> Int -> ST s ()
cuddReadPopulationSize :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddReadNumberXovers :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
cuddSetNumberXovers :: STDdManager s u -> Int -> ST s ()
regReordGCHook :: STDdManager s u -> ST s Int
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Cudd.Reorder.CuddReorderingType
instance GHC.Show.Show Cudd.Reorder.CuddReorderingType
instance GHC.Enum.Enum Cudd.Reorder.CuddReorderingType
